Name: The Dark Prophecy
About the game: Welcome to a peaceful medieval village, where life is safe and calm. But one fateful night, everything changes. Play as Jacob, an average medieval boy, on his quest to save the kingdom from a dark prophecy. Jacob finds himself amid a whirlpool of magical events. Now the fate of his village (and whole kingdom) depends on him. Help Jacob on his quest and save the kingdom from the dark prophecy, Explore the environment and find solutions to move the plot forward, Discover new items and fantastical locations, Enjoy beautiful pixel-art locations. Featuring: Choose your own adventure dialogues, 'Look at/Use/Talk to' interactions, A dark prophecy and witchcraft.
